name: plendx

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cple, cnx), cdc(nat1, nat0))
-| wceq(cple, cslot(cdc(nat1, nat0)))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), cn)

⊢ (le ` ndx)= cdc(1, 0)
⊣ le = Slot(cdc(1, 0))
⊣ cdc(1, 0)∈ ℕ
